solution_line_template: To make {num_first_type} of the first type of shirt, they will need {num_first_type}*{buttons_first_type}=<<{num_first_type}*{buttons_first_type}={buttons_needed_first}>>{buttons_needed_first} buttons.

To make {num_second_type} of the second type of shirt, they will need {num_second_type}*{buttons_second_type}=<<{num_second_type}*{buttons_second_type}={buttons_needed_second}>>{buttons_needed_second} buttons.
To manufacture {num_first_type} each of both types of shirts, they will need to use {buttons_needed_first}+{buttons_needed_second}={total_buttons} buttons.
